So, yeah, Tylon, quick introductions, I'm Raghav, I work with the account management team here at hiver.
I've been with the business for about eight years working my way through pretty much all GTM roles here at hiver, and happy to chat with you about our exciting new AI feature set.
Yeah, I noticed that you wanted to hear about pretty much the entire suite as it stands now in terms of sentiments tagging co pilot.
So, could you maybe kick us off with what AI looks like within the organization as of today?
Outside of hiver, do you use that for any facet of your work?

Yeah, we're introducing other AI features when it comes to marketing and ads, and just working more with other companies, other platforms to introduce that into our sales leads and marketing and all that kind of stuff.

But customer service is a priority of ours just because we have an extensive knowledge base, but it's requiring a lot of like time per customer and we're a small three person team with our company, but we get anywhere from like three to 400 like tickets per month, which is just, it's a lot to manage.
Wait, did you say three to 400 tickets a month for like a two to three member team?
Yeah.
That is crazy.
Yeah.

And that's like CEO, like I'm the marketing director, and then his wife is the one who kind of manages we're like a car battery company for like evs and kind… of getting into like the RV and like overland community as well.

So I feel like that is like we've been doing a lot of the groundwork and it feels like it would be, you know, an adequate knowledge base for, you know, integrating… the AI features.
It's funny because we were actually looking into like other AI platforms.
